metadata.title: CVE-2021-4091 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A double-free was found in the way 389-ds-base handles virtual attributescontext in persistent searches. An attacker could send a series of searchrequests, forcing the server to behave unexpectedly, and crash.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
